name: part_001
file: tmp_【HOPE TO THE FUTURE 3D LIVE】 IRyS 2024 Birthday Live! #IRySBDay [cc5SQqswwMM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: IRyS performs 'Sousei no Aquarion' on stage with a visual backdrop of glowing blue lines.
Transition with a black screen leading into the next song performance.
IRyS performs 'Toujisha' on a red-lit stage with dramatic lyrics appearing on screen.

subtitles.original: よみがえれ 永遠に 涸れぬ光
subtitles.english: Awaken, oh eternal and unwithering light

subtitles.original: 汚されないで 君の夢
subtitles.english: Don't let your dreams be defiled

subtitles.original: 祈り宿しながら 生まれてきた
subtitles.english: I was born while harboring a prayer

subtitles.original: 一万年と二千年前から 愛してる
subtitles.english: I've loved you for twelve thousand years

subtitles.original: 八千年過ぎた頃から もっと恋しくなった
subtitles.english: I've loved you more since eight thousand years passed

subtitles.original: 一億と二千年あとも 愛してる
subtitles.english: I'll love you even one hundred million and two thousand years from now

subtitles.original: 君を知ったその日から 僕の地獄に音楽は絶えない
subtitles.english: Since the day I met you, music has never ceased in my hell

subtitles.original: 君が繰り返し 大人になって
subtitles.english: You repeatedly grow into an adult

subtitles.original: 何度も 何度も 遠くへ行って
subtitles.english: And go far away again and again

subtitles.original: 見守る僕が眠れない
subtitles.english: Watching over you, I cannot sleep

subtitles.original: 僕がくしゃくしゃになったとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I end up worn and tattered

subtitles.original: 君の名を歌うために
subtitles.english: In order to sing your name

subtitles.original: 一万年と二千年前から 愛してる
subtitles.english: I've loved you for twelve thousand years

subtitles.original: 八千年過ぎた頃から もっと恋しくなった
subtitles.english: I've loved you more since eight thousand years passed

subtitles.original: 一億と二千年あとも 愛してる
subtitles.english: I'll love you even one hundred million and two thousand years from now

subtitles.original: 君を知ったその日から
subtitles.english: Since the day I met you

subtitles.original: 一万年と二千年前から 愛してる
subtitles.english: I've loved you for twelve thousand years

subtitles.original: 八千年過ぎた頃から もっと恋しくなった
subtitles.english: I've loved you more since eight thousand years passed

subtitles.original: 一億と二千年たっても 愛してる
subtitles.english: I'll love you even after one hundred million and two thousand years

subtitles.original: 君を知ったその日から 僕の地獄に音楽は絶えない
subtitles.english: Since the day I met you, music has never ceased in my hell

subtitles.original: 幸せを願っただけで
subtitles.english: I only wished for happiness

subtitles.original: 私の目に見えたのは
subtitles.english: But what my eyes saw was...

subtitles.original: 誰かの愛が違う
subtitles.english: Someone's love is different

subtitles.original: 誰かの愛を殺す世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where someone's love is killed

subtitles.original: この手に握った黒金
subtitles.english: This black iron I hold in my hand

subtitles.original: あとどれだけ冷静でいられるのだろう
subtitles.english: How much longer can I remain calm?

subtitles.original: それとも私はもう
subtitles.english: Or am I already...

subtitles.original: 狂ってるの？
subtitles.english: Going mad?

subtitles.original: わからない
subtitles.english: I don't know

subtitles.original: どんなに未来を描いて
subtitles.english: No matter how I picture the future

subtitles.original: 望もうがいても届かない
subtitles.english: No matter how I hope and struggle, I can't reach it

subtitles.original: 何が正しいだと言うの？
subtitles.english: What is it you call "correct"?

subtitles.original: 誰が心まで裁くの？
subtitles.english: Who will judge even the heart?

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey

subtitles.original: 命が消える 優しさのせいで
subtitles.english: Lives vanish because of kindness

subtitles.original: 弱さが罪と言うなら答えて
subtitles.english: If weakness is a sin, then answer me

subtitles.original: 私は誰を犠牲に生きて
subtitles.english: Whom am I living by sacrificing?

subtitles.original: 銃口を向ける 間違わないように
subtitles.english: I aim my gun so that I don't make a mistake

subtitles.original: 唇を噛む 滲んだ血の味は
subtitles.english: The taste of blood from biting my lip

subtitles.original: 誰も同じ あなたと奥底知ってた
subtitles.english: Everyone's the same, I knew that deep down with you

subtitles.original: 終わりのない 悲しみの行く先は
subtitles.english: Where does this endless sorrow lead?

subtitles.original: どんなに怒りを飲み込み
subtitles.english: No matter how much I swallow my anger

subtitles.original: 消してもその火は燃え上がり
subtitles.english: Even if I put it out, the fire flares up

subtitles.original: 見据えた眼差しの先は
subtitles.english: What lies ahead of my fixed gaze

subtitles.original: もう決してぶれたりしない
subtitles.english: Will never waver again

subtitles.original: 響く乾いた銃声
subtitles.english: A dry gunshot echoes

subtitles.original: 遠くで聞こえる 罵声と絶叫
subtitles.english: Abuse and screams heard in the distance

subtitles.original: 正義を問いかける
subtitles.english: Questioning justice

subtitles.original: 私と彼ら どちらが死ねばいい
subtitles.english: Me or them, who should die?

subtitles.original: 守れるものは一つしかないから
subtitles.english: Because there's only one thing I can protect
